revised_title: A Collection of Curious Plants and Drugs from the East Indies
tldr: This article presents a collection of curious plants and drugs gathered by Mr. Samuel Brown in the East Indies, with descriptions of their physical characteristics, uses, and medicinal properties. The collection was given to the Royal Society by the East India Company and includes various plant species, their names, virtues, descriptions, and more. This collection has the potential to benefit the public by providing new information on the uses and properties of these plants and drugs.
